{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Damaged Aztec pillar | class = PillarAztecDamaged | game = Strife | doomednum = 55 | convid = 212 }}[[Classes]]: PillarAztecDamaged
A damaged version of the [[Classes:PillarAztec|Aztec pillar]], but not as damaged as the [[Classes:PillarAztecRuined|ruined one]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR PillarAztecDamaged { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 80 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: STLA A -1 Stop } }
